description:
It`s the end of the year, which means Christmas presents and lots of cleaning! Fortunately, Hino is there to make sure everyone takes a break.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nul ne sait de quoi sera fait demain
Rainen o Ieba Oni ga Warau
The Devil Scoffs When You Talk of Next Year
来年を言えば鬼が笑う
